Field Detail

random

private static final MersenneTwisterFast random
A random number generator that is initialized with the clock when this class is loaded into the JVM. Use this for all random numbers. Note: This method or getting random numbers in not thread-safe. Since MersenneTwisterFast is currently (as of 9/01) not synchronized using this function may cause concurrency issues. Use the static get methods of the MersenneTwisterFast class for access to a single instance of the class, that has synchronization.
